description: This branch of esgf-getcert explores use MyProxyLogon of http://grid.ncsa.illinois.edu/myproxy/MyProxyLogon/ instead of MyProxy and implements a own implementation to convert private key PKCS#8 in PKCS#1. So it can avoid the bug with openJDK versions (https://github.com/ESGF/esgf-getcert/issues/2). Also, this new implementation allows generate a getcert.jar smaller than MyProxy version getcert.jar.
name: esgf-getcert
